mdRecord.dcterms:description: Northeast corner of Hotel, showing East Range loggia at left and "Long Walk" to the Lawn at right

Addition to north end of Hotel constructed ca. 1870. From 1869 to 1929, headquarters of the Washington Literary and Debating Society. Now houses offices of the Office of Equal Opportunity Programs. [work]
